room1.Name: Cave Entrance
room1.Description: A dimly lit cave entrance with damp walls and the constant sound of water droplets echoing in the distance.

room2.Name: Narrow Hallway
room2.Description: A narrow hallway that's hot and humid with echoing sounds bouncing off the walls.

room3.Name: Crystal Chamber
room3.Description: A chamber filled with green glowing crystals that cast an eerie light throughout the space.

room4.Name: Underground Lake
room4.Description: A vast underground lake with still water, pitch black except for a singular natural spotlight coming down in the center of the lake.

room5.Name: Bat Lair
room5.Description: A high-ceilinged chamber with stalactites and a cascading waterfall pouring from an opening in the rock.

room6.Name: Cloud Room
room6.Description: A room filled with clouds that can be walked on without falling through, giving the sensation of floating.

room7.Name: Ancient Temple
room7.Description: As you enter, the clouds dissipate revealing an ancient gold temple that gleams even in the dim light.

room8.Name: Sacred Waters
room8.Description: Water surrounds the temple and must be crossed with a boat. In the water, blue luminescent fish swim alongside giant whales.

room9.Name: Temple Dock
room9.Description: A wooden dock where the boat pulls up to, allowing safe passage from the waters to solid ground.

room10.Name: Wumpus Den
room10.Description: A large chamber with claw marks on the walls and a pair of red glowing eyes emitting from the darkness.
